price: Nsεnkyerεnee san wͻ sεdeε yɛsi bͻͻ mo, ne mmoadoma a Wama wͻn ahwete (wͻ asaase soͻ no) mu ma amanfoͻ a wͻgye die.
arabic: وَفِي خَلۡقِكُمۡ وَمَا يَبُثُّ مِن دَآبَّةٍ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wafī khalqikum wamā yabuthu min dābbatin āyātun liqawmin yūqinūna
